Description: * Fixed some cases where slows could cause your speed to fall below the 2 m/s minimum
* Fixed slow percentage calculations being based off of assuming min speed is 0 rather than 2 (in effect this reduces how strong slows are)
* T4 items cost reduced from 6.2k to 6k
* Shield duration to not take damage before regenerating increased from 18s to 30s
* Fixed {{PageRef|Ethereal Shift}} not canceling abilities like {{PageRef|Flight}}
* Fixed various bugs with {{PageRef|Arcane Surge}}
* Tick gold increased from 2/1% to 2.5/1.5%
* {{PageRef|Restorative Shot}}: Cooldown increased from 6s to 7s
* {{PageRef|Spellslinger Headshots}}: Cooldown is now on a per target basis rather than on the item itself (this is a buff/flexibility improvement)
* {{PageRef|Spellslinger Headshots}}: Spirit Amp per headshot increased from 3% to 4%
* {{PageRef|Spellslinger Headshots}}: Fixed the base Spirit Amp requiring a headshot (this fix was released recently)
* {{PageRef|Knockdown}}: Stun duration reduced form 0.75s to 0.5s for ground targets (airborne values adjusted to be similar to before)
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Now a T4 item
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Shields increased from 250 to 300
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Invisibility and speed duration increased from 5s to 7s
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: Initial fade out time reduced from 1s to the previous 0.25s value
* {{PageRef|Alchemical Fire}}: Base DPS reduced from 55 to 50
* {{PageRef|Infernus}}: {{PageRef|Flame Dash}} T3 changed Charge Time increased from 15s to 18s
* {{PageRef|Mirage}}: {{PageRef|Fire Scarabs}} T2 reduced from -10% Bullet Resist to -8%
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Assassinate}} base damage reduced from 120 to 100
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Assassinate}} bonus damage reduced from 120 to 100
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: Bullet damage growth reduced from 0.94 to 0.9
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Last Stand}} now does 40% less damage to objectives (similar to various other abilities)
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} Bullet and Spirit Resist reduced from 45% to 40%
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} T3 increased from 15% to 20% Resist
